commit.message:
Table generator for attribute values id as well

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1246629 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -23,7 +23,10 @@
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="UserAttribute" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="RoleAttribute" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="MembershipAttribute" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
-    
+    <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="UserAttributeValue" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
+    <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="RoleAttributeValue" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
+    <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="MembershipAttributeValue" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
+
     <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="token.length" confValue="256"/>
     <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="token.expireTime" confValue="60"/>
     <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="smtp.host" confValue="smtp.ngi.it"/>

@@ -23,6 +23,9 @@
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="UserAttribute" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="RoleAttribute" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="MembershipAttribute" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
+    <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="UserAttributeValue" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
+    <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="RoleAttributeValue" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
+    <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="MembershipAttributeValue" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
     
     <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="token.length" confValue="256"/>
     <SyncopeConfiguration confKey="token.expireTime" confValue="60"/>
